data.name: Angelic Fortitude
data.text: Has Attack equal to its Health.

data.name: Ascended
data.text: Stats increased.

data.name: Bring it on!
data.text: +1 Attack and Taunt.

data.name: Cloning Vector
data.text: Prepared to summon Zerek, Master Cloner

data.name: Confused
data.text: Swapped Attack and Health.

data.name: Crooked Pete
data.text: The locals report\nthat Pete is up to\nno good again.

data.name: Divine Spirit
data.text: This minion has double Health.

data.name: Forlorn Lovers
data.text: Bound by vows, she just won't let go.

data.name: Gravekeeper Damph
data.text: The rattle of bones remain a comfort to him.

data.name: Graves the Cleric
data.text: This healing adventurer was separated from his old party.

data.name: Infusion
data.text: +3 Health.

data.name: Inner Fire
data.text: This minion's Attack is equal to its Health.

data.name: Inquisitor Hav'nixx
data.text: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. It's far too delicious.

data.name: Madness Potion
data.text: This minion has switched controllers this turn.

data.name: Melt
data.text: Attack changed to 0 this turn.

data.name: Mushhuckster Max
data.text: You probably don't want the potions\nhe's hocking.

data.name: Next Hero: Priest Ench
data.text: Add Priest cards to your deck.

data.name: Next Hero: Priest Ench Copy
data.text: Add Priest cards to your deck.

data.name: Power of the Ziggurat
data.text: +3 Health.

data.name: Power Word: Shield
data.text: +2 Health.

data.name: Raeth Ghostsong
data.text: There's a reason you should burn the dead.

data.name: Reckless Experiment
data.text: This minion will die a reckless death at the end of the turn.

data.name: Reckless Experiment
data.text: Costs (3) less.

data.name: Repairs!
data.text: +4 Health.

data.name: Sazzmi Gentlehorn
data.text: [x]This satyr has a\ntendency to attract\nmore than just rats.

data.name: Seriona
data.text: A twilight dragon\nbent on draining\nyour minions.

data.name: Shadow Madness
data.text: This minion has switched controllers this turn.

data.name: Shadowed
data.text: Health was swapped.

data.name: Shadowfiended
data.text: Costs (1) less.

data.name: Shrunk
data.text: -3 Attack this turn.

data.name: Spiritspeaker Azun
data.text: This troll priest speaks with the dead... twice.

data.name: Stored Data
data.text: Storing spell.

data.name: The Darkness
data.text: There's a reason to always keep a light on down here.

data.name: Vustrasz the Ancient
data.text: His vast treasure stores are for the taking... if you dare!

data.name: Winslow Tobtock
data.text: His tricks will leave you both in a daze.

data.name: Winslow Tobtock
data.text: His tricks will leave you both in a daze.

data.name: Alms of Light
data.text: Restore 8 Health to each hero.

data.name: Circle of Healing
data.text: Restore #4 Health to ALL_minions.
data.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

data.name: Forbidden Shaping
data.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
data.flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

data.name: Priest
data.text: Select Priest as your next class.

data.name: Second Class: Priest
data.text: Add Priest cards to your deck.

data.name: Secrets of Shadow
data.text: Each player draws 2 cards.

data.name: Shadow of Nothing
data.text: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!

data.name: Silence
data.text: Silence a minion.
data.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

data.name: Topsy Turvy
data.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
data.flavor: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

data.name: Twisted Light
data.text: Restore 30 health to Nefarian. Deal 30 damage to all other minions.

data.name: Unbreakable
data.text: Inspire your minions, even in death.

data.name: Awaken the Makers
data.text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
data.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

data.name: Binding Heal
data.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
data.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

data.name: Chameleos
data.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
data.flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

data.name: Crystalline Oracle
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
data.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

data.name: Flash Heal
data.text: Restore #5 Health.
data.flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

data.name: Holy Smite
data.text: Deal $2 damage.
data.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

data.name: Inner Fire
data.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
data.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

data.name: Light of the Naaru
data.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
data.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

data.name: Mind Vision
data.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
data.flavor: I see what you did there.

data.name: Northshire Cleric
data.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
data.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

data.name: Pint-Size Potion
data.text: [x]Give all enemy minions\n-3 Attack this turn only.
data.flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

data.name: Potion of Madness
data.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
data.flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

data.name: Power Word: Glory
data.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to\nyour hero.
data.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

data.name: Power Word: Shield
data.text: Give a minion +2_Health.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

data.name: Psionic Probe
data.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
data.flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

data.name: Ripple in Time
data.text: Discover a minion. If you play it this turn, it has Echo.

data.name: Shadowbomber
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
data.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

data.name: Test Subject
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
data.flavor: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

data.name: Twilight Whelp
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
data.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Cloning Device
data.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

data.name: Confuse
data.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
data.flavor: This minion is really powerful!

data.name: Convert
data.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
data.flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

data.name: Dead Ringer
data.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
data.flavor: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

data.name: Divine Hymn
data.text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
data.flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

data.name: Divine Spirit
data.text: Double a minion's Health.
data.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

data.name: Embrace the Shadow
data.text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
data.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

data.name: Generous Spirit
data.text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nGive it to your opponent\nand draw 3 cards.

data.name: Heal
data.text: Hero Power\nRestore #4 Health.

data.name: Heal
data.text: Hero Power\nRestore #4 Health.

data.name: Lesser Heal
data.text: Hero Power\nRestore #2 Health.

data.name: Lesser Heal
data.text: Hero Power\nRestore #2 Health.

data.name: Lightwell
data.text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
data.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

data.name: Mana Geode
data.text: Whenever this minion is_healed, summon a 2/2_Crystal.
data.flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

data.name: Mind Blast
data.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
data.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

data.name: Mind Shatter
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $3 damage.

data.name: Mind Spike
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Museum Curator
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle card.
data.flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Purify
data.text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
data.flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Radiant Elemental
data.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
data.flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

data.name: Reminisce
data.text: Add two random cards your opponent played this game to your hand.

data.name: Resurrect
data.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
data.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Shadow Ascendant
data.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ngive another random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
data.flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

data.name: Shadow or Light?
data.text: Choose One - Each player draws 2 cards; or Restore 8 Health to each hero.

data.name: Shadow Visions
data.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
data.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

data.name: Shadow Word: Pain
data.text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
data.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

data.name: Shadowboxer
data.text: Whenever a minion is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
data.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

data.name: Shrinkmeister
data.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2_Attack this turn.
data.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

data.name: Spirit Lash
data.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $1 damage to_all_minions.
data.flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

data.name: Squashling
data.text: [x]Echo\nBattlecry: Restore #2 Health.
data.flavor: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

data.name: Voidform
data.text: [x]Hero Power Deal $2 damage. After you play a card, refresh this.

data.name: Wyrmrest Agent
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
data.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

data.name: Acolyte of Agony
data.text: Lifesteal
data.flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

data.name: Curious Glimmerroot
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
data.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

data.name: Dark Cultist
data.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
data.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Dragon Soul
data.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
data.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

data.name: Elixir of Hope
data.text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2\nand "Deathrattle: Return\nthis minion to your hand."

data.name: Elixir of Life
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Lifesteal.

data.name: Elixir of Purity
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Divine Shield.

data.name: Elixir of Shadows
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a 1/1 copy of_it.

data.name: Extra Arms
data.text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2.\nAdd 'More Arms!' to your\nhand that gives +2/+2.
data.flavor: All the better to hug you with!

data.name: Gilded Gargoyle
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
data.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

data.name: Kabal Talonpriest
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
data.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

data.name: Mirage Caller
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
data.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

data.name: More Arms!
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2.

data.name: Omega Medic
data.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore #10 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

data.name: Shadow Word: Death
data.text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
data.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

data.name: Shadowfiend
data.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
data.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

data.name: Shadowform
data.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
data.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

data.name: Thoughtsteal
data.text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
data.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

data.name: Twilight Acolyte
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
data.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

data.name: Twilight's Call
data.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
data.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

data.name: Unidentified Elixir
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
data.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

data.name: Velen's Chosen
data.text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
data.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

data.name: Vivid Nightmare
data.text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it with\n1 Health remaining.
data.flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

data.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
data.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
data.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

data.name: Duskbreaker
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
data.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

data.name: Eternal Servitude
data.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
data.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

data.name: Greater Healing Potion
data.text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
data.flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

data.name: Holy Champion
data.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
data.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

data.name: Hooded Acolyte
data.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your\nC'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
data.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

data.name: Lightspawn
data.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
data.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

data.name: Mass Dispel
data.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
data.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

data.name: Mindgames
data.text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
data.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

data.name: Priest of the Feast
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, restore #3 Health to\nyour hero.
data.flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Shadow Madness
data.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
data.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

data.name: Shadow Word: Horror
data.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
data.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

data.name: Shifting Shade
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
data.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

data.name: Spawn of Shadows
data.text: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
data.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

data.name: Tortollan Shellraiser
data.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
data.flavor: A hero... In a half-shell.

data.name: Amara, Warden of Hope
data.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Set your\nhero's Health to 40.

data.name: Darkshire Alchemist
data.text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health.
data.flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

data.name: Devour Mind
data.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
data.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

data.name: Drakonid Operative
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a\nDragon, Discover a card in\n_your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

data.name: Excavated Evil
data.text: Deal $3 damage to all minions.\nShuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Glitter Moth
data.text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
data.flavor: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

data.name: Holy Nova
data.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2_Health to all friendly characters.
data.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

data.name: Holy Water
data.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
data.flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

data.name: Kabal Songstealer
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Silence a minion.
data.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

data.name: Lyra the Sunshard
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
data.flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

data.name: Onyx Bishop
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
data.flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Power Word: Replicate
data.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
data.flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

data.name: Power Word: Tentacles
data.text: Give a minion +2/+6.
data.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

data.name: Quartz Elemental
data.text: Can't attack while damaged.
data.flavor: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

data.name: Raza the Chained
data.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has \nno duplicates, your Hero\n Power costs (1) this game.
data.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

data.name: Reckless Experimenter
data.text: [x]Deathrattle minions you\nplay cost (3) less, but die\nat the end of the turn.
data.flavor: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

data.name: Twilight Darkmender
data.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore #10 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

data.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
data.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

data.name: Vol'jin
data.text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
data.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

data.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
data.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
data.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

data.name: Coffin Crasher
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
data.flavor: Also does weddings.

data.name: Dragonfire Potion
data.text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions except Dragons.
data.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

data.name: Embrace Darkness
data.text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
data.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

data.name: Entomb
data.text: Choose an enemy minion.\nShuffle it into your deck.
data.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Herald Volazj
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
data.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

data.name: Holy Fire
data.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

data.name: Lady in White
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire'\n_on every minion in your deck_\n(set Attack equal to Health).
data.flavor: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

data.name: Lightbomb
data.text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
data.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

data.name: Shadow Essence
data.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
data.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

data.name: Temple Enforcer
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
data.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

data.name: Zerek, Master Cloner
data.text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
data.flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

data.name: Archbishop Benedictus
data.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
data.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

data.name: Confessor Paletress
data.text: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
data.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

data.name: Greater Diamond Spellstone
data.text: Resurrect 4 different friendly minions.

data.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
data.text: (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

data.name: Nightscale Matriarch
data.text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3_Whelp.
data.flavor: Everywhelp, get in here!

data.name: Prophet Velen
data.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
data.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

data.name: Psychic Scream
data.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

data.name: Temporus
data.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
data.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

data.name: Free From Amber
data.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
data.flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

data.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.

data.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
data.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

data.name: Obsidian Statue
data.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
data.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

data.name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
data.text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
data.flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

data.name: Mind Control
data.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
data.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."
